thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 9 of 7239
thread.title: SB

author: SB
title: SB
text:
From the moment that you walk in the door you are welcomed by the nicest people. You will then realized that you have entered a futuristic shopping experience. Dozens of packages being transported by elevated conveyors. An ingenious checkout line and a candy store of electronics.
Every salesperson is a professional so you get solid advice, not a sales pitch. Their low prices speak for themselves. Apple products are even cheaper than the Apple Store.
The website is flawless.
